quote_first: Lanky Jeff Adams was at the controls of the cramped little vessel when the first dark splinter was sighted in the void. Braced against the lurch and roll of the ship, Larry scrutinized the wrecked ship as they neared it. So unbelievable was the sight he saw that for an instant after he lowered the glasses it did not penetrate his reflexes. His fingers were tracing the vessel’s name into the log when suddenly he stared at what he had written: “
title: Buccaneer of the Star Seas
author: Ed Earl Repp
